description: Heliopolis, a so-called neutral space colony was holding a top-secret weapons research facility, producing Gundams for the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance]. http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT], which is composed of Coordinators (genetically modified/upgraded humans), attacks Heliopolis, stealing 4 out of the Alliance`s 5 Gundams. In the battlefield, civilian http://anidb.net/ch1 [Kira Yamato] stumbles upon the http://anidb.net/ch1577 [Strike], the last remaining Gundam of the Alliance, and is forced to pilot it. In the midst of battle he encounters his best friend, http://anidb.net/ch300 [Athrun Zala], as one of the hijackers of the 5 Gundams, who sides with ZAFT. Being a Coordinator, he is the only one who can pilot the Gundam. But Kira is not with ZAFT, even though they`re his own kind, nor the Alliance. Since the Alliance is the only place he could turn to at the time, he sides with them. He pilots the Gundam to protect his friends, and to fight his best friend, which pains both of them. It`s a war between individual beliefs.

REGULAR.description:
11 months have passed since the Earth Alliance and ZAFT (Zodiac Alliance of Freedom Treaty) entered into war. In L5, on the resource satellite Heliopolis of the neutral nation Orb… On this colony, Industrial College student Kira Yamato, as usual, heads for the lab where he accidentally gets involved in a Gundam extortion plan by the invading ZAFT forces.
Source: crunchyroll

Within the flames, Athrun steals the last Gundam, MS Aegis, and escapes. Kira and Murrue also get onto Strike Gundam and barely escape as the factory explodes. But ZAFT’s MS GINN was waiting for them!
Source: crunchyroll

Rau, piloting MS CGUE, attacks Kira. Just then Archangel appears in front of them. Strike Gundam’s cannon fired at Rau opens a large hole into the colony. Everyone is stunned by its power. Seeing that the odds are against him, Rau breaks away from the battle.
Source: crunchyroll

From the airspace of the destroyed Heliopolis, Kira returns to the Archangel with a life boat. Fray is discovered on board the life boat. Archangel decides to head for the allied military satellite Artemis to seek help.
Source: crunchyroll

The 4 stolen Gundams loom in front of the launched Strike Gundam. The ZAFT forces decided to throw all Gundams into the attack. Kira and Athrun face each other again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フェイズシフトダウン

REGULAR.description:
Barely fleeing its pursuing ZAFT forces, Archangel takes refuge in the military satellite “Artemis.” However, the crew is met with the muzzles of the supposedly allied soldiers.
Source: crunchyroll

Using ZAFT’s attack, the Archangel was able to escape the fortress Artemis, however, lack of supplies has become an increasingly urgent problem. Mu comes up with a plan and directs the ship to the Debris Belt to forage supplies from wrecked ships.
Source: crunchyroll

The passenger of the escape pod rescued in the Debris Belt was a girl and a small robot – Lacus Clyne and Haro. Lacus is the daughter of the current PLANT Supreme Council Chairman, Siegel Clyne.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-08 - La chanteuse de l`armée ennemie

REGULAR.description:
Finally the long-awaited rescue comes. There is brief moment of calm in the Archangel. They are to join the advance escort ship Montgomery, Bernard and Law. Fray’s father, Vice Foreign Minister of the Atlantic Federation George Allster, is aboard on Montgomery.
Source: crunchyroll

The Archangel was able to stop the attack from ZAFT ship Vesalius by using Lacus Clyne as hostage, but the shock was most detrimental, witnessing an entire fleet destroyed before the crew’s eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

As promised, Kira returns to the Archangel. A hearing is held but the issue handing over Lacus to ZAFT without permission is disregarded through the good offices of Murrue.
Source: crunchyroll

The Archangel finally rendezvous with the Earth Alliance’s 8th Fleet. Lost in busyness, as if to be reluctant to part from it, Kira does maintenance on Strike Gundam when Murrue comes and thanks him for all his hard work so far.
Source: crunchyroll

On the Earth’s orbit, a fierce battle has started between the Alliance’s 8th Fleet and the ZAFT forces. Although the Earth Alliance was superior in numbers, Rau Le Creuset’s troops, with GINNs and all 4 Gundams, destroy the Alliance’s craft one after another.
Source: crunchyroll

About half the episode consists of new scenes expanding into the creation of Coordinators, the origin of the hate between Naturals and Coordinators, the issues that escalated into the Bloody Valentine attack and the subsequent deployment of Neutron Jammers (or N-Jammers) and war, as well as some technical babble regarding the five mobile suits developed by the Earth Alliance. The rest of the episode consists mostly of old scenes (recap). The old scenes and new scenes are intertwined throughout the episode.

titles.title: Hate Shinaki Toki no Naka de
Phase-14 - Dans le flot du temps

REGULAR.description:
Upon atmospheric re-entry, to save Strike Gundam after the battle with Duel Gundam, the Archangel was diverted off course and have ended up in Africa, which is ZAFT territory.
Source: crunchyroll

The Archangel landed on the desert in North Africa. Without any time to relax, they are attacked by the ZAFT forces at night. They are the elite ground squad led by Andrew Waltfeld, also known as the “Desert Tiger.”
Source: crunchyroll

With the help from the “Desert Dawn” guerillas, Strike Gundam was able to repulse the attacking force of the BuCUEs led by Waltfeld. After daybreak, other members of Desert Dawn guerillas join the Archangel.
Source: crunchyroll

Waltfeld, the “Desert Tiger,” attacks Tassil, the town where the rebels reside. Missiles fired from the BuCUEs engulf the town in flames. However, Waltfeld’s men gave the citizens a warning before the attack, so there were no casualties.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-18 - Œil pour œil, dent pour dent

REGULAR.description:
Kira and Cagalli go to the city of Banadiya, where the ZAFT base is located, to buy food and supplies for the camp. The two accidently meet the “Desert Tiger” Andrew Waltfeld when they are eating lunch and are baffled over his overly friendly manner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-19 - Dans les griffes de l`ennemi

REGULAR.description:
In a PLANT, Athrun has a day off after a long time and drives to Lacus’ mansion for a visit. Clyne’s estate is located at an exclusive residential area in PLANT, and the two happily enjoy chatting.
Source: crunchyroll

Yzak and Dearka, who were in the Gibraltar Base, join forces with the Lesseps. Towards the battle against the Archangel, “Desert Tiger” Waltfeld accepts the reinforcement thinking more force the better.
Source: crunchyroll

Strike Gundam and the Archangel, defeating Waltfeld after a fierce fight, take course towards Alaska. Cagalli of the “Desert Dawn” insists that she is needed on the ship and invites herself to come aboard the Archangel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-22 - Quand la mer se teint de pourpre

REGULAR.description:
Athrun, Nicole, and Rau join. The Le Creuset Team is finally gathered all together after a long time. Since Rau cannot go out to fight because of the preparations for Operation Spit Break, he appoints Athrun as leader of the Archangel pursuit team.
Source: crunchyroll

Cagalli’s damaged Sky Grasper shoots down the transport plane that was carrying Aegis Gundam and crash-land on a small deserted island. She encounters Athrun, who was on the transport plane, on the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

In Orb waters, the Archangel and the 4 Gundams of Zala Team engage in a fierce battle. Near the Orb’s territorial boundaries, the Archangel is gradually cornered by the Zala Team with its superb combination attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-25 - Vers le pays de la paix

REGULAR.description:
Inside the Orb’s dock, technicians work on repairs to the Archangel damaged by the battle. Morgenroete Incorporated’s engineer Erica Simmons, who is also responsible for the development of M1 Astray, analyzes the data submitted by the Archangel.
Source: crunchyroll

Through the good offices of Murrue, the student crew are able to meet with their parents within the Orb headquarters. Parents and children are reunited after a long time and they check each other’s safety, rejoicing in their happiness.
Source: crunchyroll

The Archangel’s repair and replenishment are completed and it prepares to leave Orb. Meanwhile, Athrun’s Zala Team is outside the Orb territorial waters, waiting for the Archangel to sail out.
Source: crunchyroll

Kira strikes down Zala Team’s Blitz Gundam. Murdoch and the other engineering crew congratulate him. He clenches his fist while listening to their praise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-30 - Le temps de la lumière

REGULAR.description:
Contact is lost with Strike Gundam and 2nd unit Sky Grasper, and the Archangel is in chaos. Moreover, the ZAFT’s pursuit is closing in on the severely damaged Archangel.
Source: crunchyroll

Many were lost but the Archangel finally arrives at the Earth Alliance headquarters in Alaska (JOSH-A). But the crew is not allowed to disembark and is ordered to remain on standby.
Source: crunchyroll

The assault by Miriaria and Flay towards the prisoner Dearka became a big problem in the Archangel. Natarle talks to Murrue about the importance of following military regulations and questions Murrue’s lack of control in handling prisoners and guns.
Source: crunchyroll

The crew, who has supported the Archangel all this time, is upset to hear that the three are due to transfer. As if to make matters worse, orders are given that the Archangel will no longer belong to the 8th Fleet but now serve as part of Alaska’s defense forces.
Source: crunchyroll

In Alaska, the Archangel is in a fierce battle with the ZAFT forces. The MS troops loom and surge forward. The main force of the Alliance were sent to the Panama defense so obviously they are facing a challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

The report of Operation Spit Break’s failure sends the ZAFT National Defense Committee in chaos. At the same time, Patrick Zala learns that the latest MS Freedom Gundam, which was secretly developed by ZAFT, was stolen.
Source: crunchyroll

Heavily impaired, the Archangel barely escapes the self-destructed Alaska base. It heads for Orb in order to repair the damage and arrives at Onogoro Island. Cagalli, confirming that Kira is indeed alive, jumps on him with tears in her eyes. She tells him about how she found Athrun.
Source: crunchyroll

With the fall of the Alliance’s Panama Base, the Earth Alliance loses the mass driver and the path out to space. Scheming begins how to claim the remaining mass driver on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-38 - Les feux de la décision

REGULAR.description:
Kira and Freedom Gundam engage with the Earth Alliance’s latest three Gundam units, Calamity, Forbidden, and Raider Gundam. Justice Gundam, piloted by Athrun, emerges before Kira.
Source: crunchyroll

Orb requests peace talks time and time again, but Azrael of the Alliance turns a deaf ear. The Earth Alliance has already decided to control Orb by force.
Source: crunchyroll

Kusanagi and the Archangel launch into space. Kusanagi’s docking is completed and they take course to the abandoned colonies in the L4 cluster to refill their water and supplies.
Source: crunchyroll

Athrun leaves for PLANT to see his father, the PLANT Supreme Council Chairman Patrick Zala, and ask his true intention in fighting this war. Kira volunteers to escort Athrun’s shuttle with Freedom Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

At the Alliance’s Ptolemaeus lunar base, Archangel-class 2nd battleship Dominion flies in orbit and performs a combat simulation. In the captain’s seat, sits Lieutenant Natarle Badgiruel.
Source: crunchyroll

The Dominion attacks to destroy the Archangel. The Alliance’s three Gundams are overwhelmed by Kira and Athrun’s combination attacks that are perfectly in tune with each other.
Source: crunchyroll

Kira and Mu chase after Rau inside an abandoned building. The building was the Mendel colony’s generic research laboratory. Rau, Mu, and Kira engage in a gunfight.
Source: crunchyroll

The battle resumes between the Archangel and the Dominion. Rau launches Vesalius and weave its way through the two battleships, saying to target the Eternal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-46 - Là où se retirent les esprits

REGULAR.description:
With Flay’s disk, the Earth Alliance now acquired the technology of the N-Jammer Canceller. Cunningly manipulated by Azrael, the nuclear missiles are shipped up into space.
Source: crunchyroll

The gamma-ray of GENESIS destroys the front line of the Alliance fleet in the blink of an eye. It was ZAFT’s trump card, hidden all along by Mirage Colloid. It could take aim and easily be fired at Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase-48 - Le jour de la colère

REGULAR.description:
The second ray of GENESIS destroys the Earth Alliance lunar base. The next target might be Earth. The Alliance regroup the devastated fleet, and launch the Peacemaker divisions once again.
Source: crunchyroll

Even with all the casualties, the fighting continues. Flay’s shuttle, by abandoning the Dominion, wanders into the area where Freedom Gundam and Providence Gundam are violently fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Phase Finale - Vers des lendemains sans fin

SPECIAL.description:
As the war between ZAFT`s Coordinators and Earth`s Naturals comes to a close, the survivors of the conflict recuperate. Some of these veterans heal with the aid of loved ones, and others choose to recover in isolation, reflecting on their losses and the friends no longer with them.
In this epilogue to the hardships of Kira Yamato and Athrun Zala, the heroes come to terms with their roles in the recent war and prepare for adventures yet to come.
Source: MAL (modified)
